scripts.sass: node-sass --watch styles/*.scss -o dist --output-style compressed -q --source-map-root file://${PWD}/ --source-map-embed true
scripts.build: node-sass --include-path scss styles/app.scss dist/app.css --source-map-root file://${PWD}/ --source-map-embed true
scripts.start: concurrently  " npm run sass " " npm run serve  "
